import React from 'react' import bg from '../../assets/bg_reason.png' import num1 from '../../assets/1.svg' import num2 from '../../assets/2.svg' import num3 from '../../assets/3.svg' import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next' const Reasons = () => { const { t } = useTranslation(); return(

{t('reasonTitleFirst')}

{t('reasonTitleEnd')}

{t('FirstReason')}

BitQuant can provide you with the guaranteed monthly profit up to 20%

To be sure that the trading bot works properly we have real traders who have developed the platform. A constant control from them will help the system performs stable and make profit

) } export default Reasons
